question: I am a 32 year old male, in good health, I was exercising regularly and I am not overweight. 4 weeks ago I felt like I was having heart attack symptoms: pain and tightness in my chest, blury vision, lightheaded, loss of sensation and tingling in my arms, feet. legs and fingers.  An EKG revealed nothing wrong. Additionally, I was tested from everything from STDs, to Diabetes and no signs. I went most recently to a cardiologists and the stress tests and eciocardiogram revealed nothing.  However, my symptoms still persist.Could this be stress,  as some have suggested...or panic attacks?  If not does this sound like something neurological. I am trying to determine what my next course of action should be?
title: No Diagnosis of Symptoms
